content: elevate the cuteness of your jellycat amuseables peanut bag charm with this adorable and simple-to-knit winter ensemble the pattern includes suggested stitch counts and needle sizes for both fingering-weight and dk-weight yarns for the beanie you ll find instructions for both knitting in the round and flat knitting without decreases making it easy for beginners each piece requires only a small amount of yarn so this is a good project to use up your scrap yarn while this pattern is for basic beanie and scarf feel free to get creative with colors stripes and other embellishments to make your peanut bag charm uniquely yours
